title: U.K. Is Among First Western Nations to Increase Taxes to Cover Covid-19 Costs
content:
1. U.K. Is Among First Western Nations to Increase Taxes to Cover Covid-19 Costs  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Boris Johnson raises taxes by £12bn a year to fund NHS and social care  Guardian News
  3. UK’s Boris Johnson to hike taxes to tackle Covid and social-care crises  CNBC
  4. More money for the NHS is overdue, but there’s not nearly enough to fix social care  The Guardian
  5. Boris Johnson’s social care tax will hit poor working pensioners – his disregard for older people is clear  iNews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
U.K. Is Among First Western Nations to Increase Taxes to Cover Covid-19 Costs  The Wall Street Journal
Boris Johnson raises taxes by £12bn a year to fund NHS and social care  Guardian News
UK’s Boris Johnson to hike taxes to tackle Covid and social-care crises  CNBC
More money for the NHS is overdue, but there’s not nearly enough to fix social care  The Guardian
Boris Johnson’s social care tax will hit poor working pensioners – his disregard for older people is clear  iNews

localize.title: 英国、欧米諸国に先駆けてコヴィド-19のコストをカバーするために増税を実施
英国是西方国家中最早增加税收以支付Covid-19费用的国家之一
英國是西方國家中最早增加稅收以支付Covid-19費用的國家之一
